text: Patrice Émery Trovoada (born 18 March 1962) is a São Toméan politician. He was the 15th prime minister of São Tomé and Príncipe from November 2014 to December 2018. He also served as Prime Minister from February 2008 to June 2008 and again from August 2010 to December 2012. On 6 January 2025, President Carlos Vila Nova dismissed Trovoada and his government, citing Trovoada's prolonged absences and his government's failure to solve multiple issues. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Patrice Trovoada
